languages.text: {n}Загадочные "интересанты" прибыли на планету со свитами из малатеков, отлученных техноматов и подозрительных книжников. Без споров выложив баснословные суммы за право прикоснуться к ранее неведомой ксенозаразе, они направились в недра умирающего мануфакторума.{/n}

{n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Загадочные "интересанты" прибыли на планету со свитами из малатеков, отлученных техноматов и подозрительных книжников. Без споров выложив баснословные суммы за право прикоснуться к ранее неведомой ксенозаразе, они направились в недра умирающего мануфакторума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mysterious "interests" have arrived on the planet with entourage comprised of malatechs, excommunicated Technomats and shady scribes. Without talking, they have paid fabulous sums for the right to experience the previously unknown xeno-disease, and headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

{n}The mysterious "interests" have arrived on the planet with entourage comprised of malatechs, excommunicated Technomats and shady scribes. Without talking, they have paid fabulous sums for the right to experience the previously unknown xeno-disease, and headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

{n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

{n}The mysterious "seekers" have arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malatechs, excommunicated technomats, and shady scribes. Without talking, they have paid fabulous sums for the right to experience the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

Without talking, they have paid fabulous sums for the right to experience the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

{n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

{n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}神秘的“各方相关人员”来到了这颗行星，其中包括黑暗贤者、被逐出教会的技工，以及形迹可疑的学者。为了能够接触这种不为人知的异形疫病，他们甚至连讨价还价都省略掉了，直接支付了数额惊人的费用，随后进入了垂死的制造工厂内部。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}神秘的“各方相关人员”来到了这颗行星，其中包括黑暗贤者、被逐出教会的技工，以及形迹可疑的学者。为了能够接触这种不为人知的异形疫病，他们甚至连讨价还价都省略掉了，直接支付了数额惊人的费用，随后进入了垂死的制造工厂内部。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las misteriosas "partes interesadas" han llegado al planeta con un séquito compuesto por malateks, tecnómatas excomulgados y eruditos de aspecto sospechoso. Sin intentar regatear, han pagado sumas exorbitantes por el derecho a acceder a esta xenoplaga hasta ahora desconocida y luego se han adentrado en las profundidades del moribundo manufactorum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las misteriosas "partes interesadas" han llegado al planeta con un séquito compuesto por malateks, tecnómatas excomulgados y eruditos de aspecto sospechoso. Sin intentar regatear, han pagado sumas exorbitantes por el derecho a acceder a esta xenoplaga hasta ahora desconocida y luego se han adentrado en las profundidades del moribundo manufactorum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}正体不明の関心を持つ者が、マラテック、破門されたテクノマット、胡散臭い書記から構成される側近を引き連れてこの惑星に到着した。彼らは何ひとつ語らずに今までに未知であったのゼノ感染症を体験する権利のために大金を払い、廃墟寸前の聖工場の地下へと消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}正体不明の"シーカーたち"が、マラテック、破門されたテクノマット、胡散臭い書記から構成される側近を引き連れてこの惑星に到着した。彼らは何ひとつ語らずに今までに未知であったのゼノ感染症を体験する権利のために大金を払い、廃墟寸前の聖工場の地下へと消えていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mystérieuses "parties intéressées" arrivent sur la planète avec une cohorte de malateks, de technomates excommuniés et d'érudits pour le moins suspects. Sans même tenter de négocier, ils versent des sommes faramineuses pour obtenir l'autorisation d'étudier la xénomaladie jusqu'alors inconnue, puis s'enfoncent dans les entrailles du manufactorum agonisant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mystérieuses "parties intéressées" arrivent sur la planète avec une cohorte de malateks, de technomates excommuniés et d'érudits pour le moins suspects. Sans même tenter de négocier, ils versent des sommes faramineuses pour obtenir l'autorisation d'étudier la xénomaladie jusqu'alors inconnue, puis s'enfoncent dans les entrailles du manufactorum agonisant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die mysteriösen "interessierten Parteien" sind auf dem Planeten eingetroffen, begleitet von einem Gefolge aus Malateks, exkommunizierten Technomaten und zwielichtigen Schreibern. Anstatt zu feilschen, haben sie exorbitante Summen bezahlt, um sich Zugang zu der bisher unbekannten Xeno-Krankheit zu verschaffen, ehe sie in die Eingeweide des sterbenden Manufactorums marschierten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die mysteriösen "interessierten Parteien" sind auf dem Planeten eingetroffen, begleitet von einem Gefolge aus Malateks, exkommunizierten Technomaten und zwielichtigen Schreibern. Anstatt zu feilschen, haben sie exorbitante Summen bezahlt, um sich Zugang zu der bisher unbekannten Xeno-Krankheit zu verschaffen, ehe sie in die Eingeweide des sterbenden Manufactorums marschierten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gizemli "taraflar"; teküfranlardan, aforoz edilmiş teknomatlardan ve şaibeli katiplerden oluşan bir kortej eşliğinde gezegene geldi. Bu meçhul zeno vebasına erişmek için pazarlık etmeden fahiş rakamlar ödediler ve ölmekte olan manufaktorumun derinliklerine doğru yola çıktılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious "interested parties" arrived on the planet with an entourage comprised of malateks, excommunicated technomats, and shady-looking scholars. Without even trying to haggle, they paid exorbitant sums to obtain access to the previously unknown xenodisease, and then headed off into the bowels of the dying manufactorum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gizemli "taraflar"; teküfranlardan, aforoz edilmiş teknomatlardan ve şaibeli katiplerden oluşan bir kortej eşliğinde gezegene geldi. Bu meçhul zeno vebasına erişmek için pazarlık etmeden fahiş rakamlar ödediler ve ölmekte olan manufaktorumun derinliklerine doğru yola çıktılar.{/n}
